channel.title: Tips on zhili
channel.description: Recent content in Tips on zhili

item.title: 7z command
item.description: exclude file Specifies which filenames or wildcarded names must be excluded from the operation. Multiple exclude switches are supported. Syntax 1 2 3 4 -x[<recurse_type>]<file_ref> <recurse_type> ::= r[- | 0] <file_ref> ::= @{listfile} | !{wildcard} See -i (Include) switch description for information about option parameters. Examples 1 7z a -tzip archive.zip *.txt -x!temp.* adds to the archive.zip all *.txt files, except temp.* files. 1 7z a archive.
